  • Method Details

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()

    • getPoliticalParty

      public Party getPoliticalParty()
      Returns Party of user.
      If user is Party.HITLER then Party.FASCIST is returned.
      To check if player is hitler, call isHitler().
      Returns:
      Political party of user.

    • isHitler

      public boolean isHitler()
      Checks if player is hitler. Used because getPoliticalParty() will not return if player is Hitler or not, but only if they are a fascist or liberal.
      Returns:
      true if player has the political party of Party.HITLER.

    • setName

      public void setName​(java.lang.String name)

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage​(JsonPacketBuilder packet) throws java.io.IOException
      Send a JSON message to the user.
      Parameters:
      packet - JSON packet to be sent to the user.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If outstream is closed.

    • setPoliticalParty

      public void setPoliticalParty​(Party party)
